configuration:
fs.default.name hdfs://<%= hadoop_namenode_host %>:<%= hadoop_namenode_port%>
hadoop.security.authentication <%= hadoop_security_authentication %>
<% if hadoop_security_authentication == "kerberos" %>
hadoop.security.authorization true
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_security_group_mapping") %>
hadoop.security.group.mapping <%= hadoop_security_group_mapping %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_core_proxyusers") %> <% hadoop_core_proxyusers.each do |superuser, data| %>
hadoop.proxyuser.<%= superuser %>.hosts <%= data['hosts'] %>
hadoop.proxyuser.<%= superuser %>.groups <%= data['groups'] %>
<% end %>
<% end %>
dfs.permissions false
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_snappy_codec") %>
io.compression.codecs org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec,org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.DefaultCodec,org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.BZip2Codec,org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_fs_inmemory_size_mb") %>
fs.inmemory.size.mb <%= hadoop_config_fs_inmemory_size_mb %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_io_file_buffer_size") %>
io.file.buffer.size <%= hadoop_config_io_file_buffer_size %>
<% end %>
